videoSnippet.title: No King is Safe! || Wei Yi vs Vidit || Tata Steel Chess (2024)
videoSnippet.description:
Download Mproov and Improve Your Chess Today! https://app.mproov.me/AgadYouTube1

Wei Yi (2740) - Vidit, Santosh Gujrathi (2742)
Tata Steel Masters (chess24.com) [13] 2024.01.28
D05 Colle system

1.d4 d5 2.Nf3 Nf6 3.e3 c5 4.c3 e6 5.Bd3 Nbd7 6.Nbd2 Bd6 7.O-O O-O 8.Re1 Qc7 9.e4 cxd4 10.cxd4 dxe4 11.Nxe4 b6 12.Bg5 Nxe4 13.Rxe4 Bb7 14.Rc1 Qb8 15.Rh4 f5 16.Bc4 Qe8 17.Qb3 Kh8 18.Re1 Be4 19.Bxe6 Qg6 20.Bd2 Nf6 21.Ng5 f4 22.Rxh7+ Nxh7 23.Nxe4 f3 24.g3 Be7 25.d5 Rad8 26.Qa4 a5 27.Qc6 Bb4 28.Bxb4 axb4 29.h4 Ra8 30.Nd6 Ra7 31.Qxb6 Rxa2 32.Qc7 Nf6 33.Nf7+ Kh7 34.Ne5 Qh6 35.Qc2+ g6 36.Nxg6 Rfa8 37.Ne5+ Kg7 38.Qc7+

Timestamps:

0:00 Hello Everyone

World Chess Champion Ding Liren returns for the 86th edition of the Tata Steel Masters, a 14-player single round-robin taking place from 13-28 January in Wijk aan Zee, the Netherlands.

The time control is 100 minutes for 40 moves, followed by 50 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment per move from move 1. A tie for first place will be decided by two blitz (3+2) games. If still tied, the players keep playing single "sudden death" games where White gets 2.5 minutes and Black 3 minutes until one side wins. The monetary prizes will be shared evenly. Official website: www.tatasteelchess.com

judgment.name: Blunder
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Qxg6 was best.

judgment.name: Inaccuracy
